Action.author: rajeshkalaria
Action.body: ~gudkov , 100 such use cases should work fine parallely?

Action.author: rajeshkalaria
Action.body: ~gudkov , although you guys are working on IS-897, and it may improve things for sure, I just wanted to mention that in our use case (which is mentioned in this story), if we try 50 (or 100) parallel requests, there will be that many new wallets will get created and opened. So, we'll have to still wait and see how much IS-897 fix will improve our use case.
